term.title: electrogenerated chemiluminescence

item.text: Luminescence produced by electrode reactions. Also called electroluminescence or electrochemiluminescence.

sources.item: PAC, 1996, 68, 2223. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry (IUPAC Recommendations 1996)' on page 2238 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199668122223)

term.citation: Citation: 'electrogenerated chemiluminescence' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.E01966

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
